section_description: Over 10 years building scalable and high-impact software solutions.

talisis.description: Led the e-commerce development of the Talisis.com educational platform, designing full-stack solutions with React, Node.js, and AWS.

highlights.point2: $400,000+ MXN monthly revenue enabled by the payment flow.
highlights.point3: Developed responsive interfaces with React.js, Redux, and Material UI.
highlights.point4: Designed serverless architectures with AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, Step Functions, and EventBridge) for secure transactions.
highlights.point5: Developed high-performance REST APIs on API Gateway, implementing JWT tokens and Lambda Authorizers.
highlights.point6: Designed data models with dbdiagram.io and SQL Server, including encryption for sensitive data.
highlights.point7: Ensured code quality through code reviews, testing, and error/log monitoring with Sentry.
highlights.point8: Documented architectures, payment processes, data models, and APIs in ClickUp and Postman.
highlights.point9: Created a QR access application in 3 days for massive events, with real-time monitoring.

enkontrol.description: Actively participated in the modernization of the Enkontrol ERP, leading business process analysis and the development of new full-stack functionalities with ASP.NET and React.

highlights.point1: Developed responsive interfaces using React.js, TypeScript, Redux, and CSS, improving system usability and performance.
highlights.point2: Developed RESTful APIs in ASP.NET (C#), applying SOLID principles and design patterns to ensure scalability and maintainability.
highlights.point3: Led a development team, coordinating tasks and ensuring timely deliveries.
highlights.point4: Conducted requirements analysis and database design in SQL Server, optimizing key ERP processes.

tca.description: Developed and maintained applications for the Merksyst commercial ERP, and actively contributed to the system migration to a modern web platform with ASP.NET.

highlights.point1: Maintained a commercial ERP using C/C++, Delphi Pascal, and SQL Server.
highlights.point2: Participated in the system migration to a web platform with ASP.NET MVC.
highlights.point3: 40+ SQL queries optimized, improving overall system performance.
highlights.point4: 300+ critical support tickets successfully resolved, ensuring customer satisfaction.

consiss.description: Developed a complete mobile solution for an Arca Continental customer loyalty program.

highlights.point1: Developed a native loyalty application for Android using Java.
highlights.point2: Implemented the application backend with ASP.NET Web API (C#).
highlights.point3: Developed a web administrative panel for user and reward management.
